hello.response: Hello! How can I help you today?

goodbye.response: Goodbye! Take care and stay safe!

help.response: If this is a medical emergency, please use the emergency request feature. Would you like me to guide you through that process?

process.response: To submit an emergency request, click on the 'Emergency Request' button and fill out the form with the patient's name, age, and problem description. Our team will review it immediately.

thanks.response: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?

capabilities.response: I can help you with emergency requests, provide information about our services, and answer general questions. Just let me know what you need!

what_is_lifelane.response: LifeLane lets you turn your private car into an emergency vehicle by requesting a verified siren activation code during real medical emergencies.

how_works.response: You submit an emergency request. After it's verified by our team, you get a one-time-use code to activate your siren device.

who_verifies.response: Our internal admin team verifies each request manually before issuing a siren code.

ambulance.response: No. LifeLane helps you use your own vehicle as emergency transport when ambulances aren't available.

how_to_submit.response: Click 'Request Emergency' on the app or website and fill in the patient name, age, and emergency details.

after_submit.response: Your request goes to our admin team. Once approved, you'll receive a one-time code to activate your siren device.

rejected.response: If your request is dismissed, you'll be notified in your dashboard. You can submit a new request if needed.

what_is_code.response: A siren code is a one-time-use code you receive after approval. Entering it into your LifeLane device activates your siren.

multiple_use.response: No. Each siren code is valid for one-time use only and expires after a few minutes.

code_validity.response: Your siren code is valid for 5 minutes from the time it's issued.

code_not_working.response: Make sure you're entering it correctly. If it still doesn't work, contact support immediately.

need_device.response: Yes. You need the LifeLane siren device installed in your vehicle to use the code and activate the siren.

how_device_works.response: The device checks the code you enter against a list of valid ones stored in it. If the code is valid, the siren turns on.

device_not_responding.response: Please check the power and re-enter your code. If the problem continues, contact our support team.

misuse.response: Misuse may result in account suspension, fines, or legal action. LifeLane is only for real emergencies.

legal.response: You can only activate the siren after verified approval and with a valid code. Misuse is strictly prohibited.

past_requests.response: Go to your dashboard to view all your requests and their current status.

pending.response: Your request has been submitted and is waiting for admin verification.

granted.response: Your request was approved and a siren code has been issued.

dismissed.response: Your request was reviewed but not approved. You can submit a new one if needed.

contact.response: You can email us at lifelanesupport@gmail.com or call +91 73938 00862.

emergency_support.response: Yes. Our support team is available 24/7 to assist with code issues or emergency requests.

different_question.response: I'm here to help! Please ask your question or contact support for more detailed assistance.

fallback: I'm not sure I understand. Could you please rephrase your question or use the emergency request feature if this is urgent?
